void cvl_visualize_vector2_color (cvl_frame_t *dst, cvl_frame_t *src)

Function Documentation

void cvl_visualize_vector2_color ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
Transform the x,y coordinates of the vector data in src to the color components R,G. Each component of the normalized vector will be transformed from [-1,1] to [0,1] for this purpose. The frame dst must be in CVL_RGB format.
